TextView.android:text:
Focused on clarity and ease of use, Citeline is a simple note-taking app meant to help medical students take notes easier. 

Citeline is inspired by the hierarchical structure many folder systems utilize, as well as more complicated note-taking apps like Obsidian. However, Citeline aims to be much more user friendly than its inspirations. 

And though its focus is on medical students, we hope that all manner of students will benefit from the app's use.
